• {{ item.text }}
import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-menu", templateUrl: "./menu.component.html", styleUrls: ["./menu.component.scss"], }) export class MenuComponent implements OnInit { //#region Variables menuItems: menuItem[] = [ { text: "Home", routerLink: "/" }, { text: "Contacto", routerLink: "/contact" }, { text: "Proyectos", routerLink: "/projects" }, { text: "Nosotros", routerLink: "/about-us" }, ]; //#endregion Variables constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} } //#region Interfaces interface menuItem { text: string; routerLink: string; } //#endregion Interfaces
